posting_body: ['Edge at Traverse Pointe', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '1131 Wigwam', 'Henderson, NV 89074', 'show contact info', 'The Edge at Traverse Point Apartments makes it easier to get into your new homes.', 'Save hundreds of dollars on move in costs with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT.', 'Ask our team for details on the program.', 'The newest luxury apartment community in Henderson, we offer one, two, and three-bedroom apartments in Henderson, NV.', 'Bedrooms: 1 |  Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 643 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1545 - $2453/Month', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '✓ Assigned Parking', '✓ Common Area Wi-Fi', '✓ Door-to-Door Trash Pickup', '✓ Garage(s)', '✓ Online Leasing', '✓ On-Line Payments', '✓ Onsite Maintenance', '✓ On-Site Management', '✓ Package Service', '✓ Pet Exercise Park', '✓ Pet Washing Station', '✓ Smoke Free', '✓ 24/7 Fitness Center with Towel & Water Service', '✓ Cabana', '✓ Electric Car Charging Stations', '✓ E-Lounge with Wi-Fi', '✓ Green Globes Certified', '✓ No Security Deposit Required OAC', '✓ Package Receiving', '✓ Self-Guided Tours', '✓ Smoke-Free Community', '✓ Sundeck and Outdoor Lounging Area', '✓ Two Pools and a Hot Tub/Spa', 'This Unit Comes With:', '✓ Air Conditioning/Heating', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Large Bedrooms', '✓ Pantry', '✓ Pet Friendly Community', '✓ Range', '✓ Refrigerator/Ice Maker/Freezer', '✓ Tub/Shower', '✓ Window Coverings', '✓ Dark Cherry Cabinetry', '✓ Double Vanities', '✓ High Speed Internet Access/Cable Ready', '✓ Hue Lighting', '✓ Nest Thermostat', '✓ Stainless Steel Appliances', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Washer/Dryer', '✓ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', '✓ Wood Inspired Flooring', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Phone-Number:', 'show contact info', 'Pet-Policy: For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'The Edge at Traverse Pointe Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household.', 'Monthly pet rent is $35 for one (1) pet and $60 for two (2) pets.', 'As well as a one time non-refundable pet fee for $300 for one (1) pet and $500 non-refundable pet fee for two (2) pets.', 'Lease-Length: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Call for Directions', 'Availability and pricing are subject to change without notice.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'SPRCL88', 'B130C20098714BF']
